name: Rosa Scotti
goal:
Expertise on the impacts of environmental problems on the marine living resources production; analysis of the interaction among humans, climate changes and the coastal ecosystems.
Scopes: contributing to increase knowledge about the impacts of climate changes and of marine pollution on the coastal ecosystems.
interests: Climate Action, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Dir. CE 2008/58, Blue Growth Strategy, Piano Strategico per l'Acquacoltura in Italia (Aquaculture Strategic Plane for Italy) and Fishery Common Policy.
